verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Again, thou shalt say to the children of Israel, Whosoever he be of the children of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn in Israel, that giveth any of his seed unto Molech; he shall surely be put to death: the people of the land shall stone him with stones.
verses.ct: "Tell the Israelites: Anyone among the Israelites, or any foreigner living in Israel, who sacrifices any of his children to Molech must be executed. The people of the community must stone him to death.

verses.kjv: And I will set my face against that man, and will cut him off from among his people; because he hath given of his seed unto Molech, to defile my sanctuary, and to profane my holy name.
verses.ct: I myself will turn against that person and remove him from his people, because by sacrificing his child to Molech, he has contaminated my sanctuary and dishonored my holy name.

verses.kjv: And if the people of the land do any ways hide their eyes from the man, when he giveth of his seed unto Molech, and kill him not:
verses.ct: If the people of the community look the other way when someone sacrifices his child to Molech and do not execute him,

verses.kjv: Then I will set my face against that man, and against his family, and will cut him off, and all that go a whoring after him, to commit whoredom with Molech, from among their people.
verses.ct: then I myself will turn against that person and his family. I will remove him and everyone who follows his example by prostituting themselves to Molech — I will cut all of them off from their people.

verses.kjv: And the soul that turneth after such as have familiar spirits, and after wizards, to go a whoring after them, I will even set my face against that soul, and will cut him off from among his people.
verses.ct: If anyone turns to mediums or spiritists, prostituting themselves by consulting them, I will turn against that person and remove him from his people.

verses.kjv: Sanctify yourselves therefore, and be ye holy: for I am the LORD your God.
verses.ct: So set yourselves apart and be holy, because I am the LORD your God.

verses.kjv: And ye shall keep my statutes, and do them: I am the LORD which sanctify you.
verses.ct: Obey my regulations and carry them out. I am the LORD who makes you holy.

verses.kjv: For every one that curseth his father or his mother shall be surely put to death: he hath cursed his father or his mother; his blood shall be upon him.
verses.ct: Anyone who curses his father or mother must be executed. He has cursed his father or mother — he is responsible for his own death.

verses.kjv: And the man that committeth adultery with another man’s wife, even he that committeth adultery with his neighbour’s wife, the adulterer and the adulteress shall surely be put to death.
verses.ct: If a man commits adultery with another man's wife — with his neighbor's wife — both the man and the woman who committed adultery must be executed.

verses.kjv: And the man that lieth with his father’s wife hath uncovered his father’s nakedness: both of them shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
verses.ct: If a man sleeps with his father's wife, he has violated his father's marriage. Both of them must be executed — they are responsible for their own deaths.

verses.kjv: And if a man lie with his daughter in law, both of them shall surely be put to death: they have wrought confusion; their blood shall be upon them.
verses.ct: If a man sleeps with his daughter-in-law, both of them must be executed. What they have done is a perversion — they are responsible for their own deaths.

verses.kjv: If a man also lie with mankind, as he lieth with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
verses.ct: If a man has sexual relations with another man as one does with a woman, both of them have committed something detestable. They must be executed — they are responsible for their own deaths.

verses.kjv: And if a man take a wife and her mother, it is wickedness: they shall be burnt with fire, both he and they; that there be no wickedness among you.
verses.ct: If a man marries both a woman and her mother, it is an act of depravity. All 3 of them must be burned with fire, so that such wickedness does not exist among you.

verses.kjv: And if a man lie with a beast, he shall surely be put to death: and ye shall slay the beast.
verses.ct: If a man has sexual relations with an animal, he must be executed, and you must kill the animal as well.

verses.kjv: And if a woman approach unto any beast, and lie down thereto, thou shalt kill the woman, and the beast: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
verses.ct: If a woman approaches any animal to have sexual relations with it, you must kill both the woman and the animal. They must be put to death — they are responsible for their own deaths.

verses.kjv: And if a man shall take his sister, his father’s daughter, or his mother’s daughter, and see her nakedness, and she see his nakedness; it is a wicked thing; and they shall be cut off in the sight of their people: he hath uncovered his sister’s nakedness; he shall bear his iniquity.
verses.ct: If a man takes his sister — whether his father's daughter or his mother's daughter — and they see each other's nakedness, it is a disgraceful act. They must be publicly removed from their people. He has violated his sister — he will bear the consequences of his sin.

verses.kjv: And if a man shall lie with a woman having her sickness, and shall uncover her nakedness; he hath discovered her fountain, and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood: and both of them shall be cut off from among their people.
verses.ct: If a man has relations with a woman during her menstrual period, exposing her flow of blood, both of them have uncovered what should remain covered. Both must be removed from their people.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy mother’s sister, nor of thy father’s sister: for he uncovereth his near kin: they shall bear their iniquity.
verses.ct: You must not have sexual relations with your mother's sister or your father's sister, because that violates a close relative. Both parties will bear the consequences of their sin.

verses.kjv: And if a man shall lie with his uncle’s wife, he hath uncovered his uncle’s nakedness: they shall bear their sin; they shall die childless.
verses.ct: If a man sleeps with his uncle's wife, he has violated his uncle's marriage. They will bear the consequences of their sin — they will die without children.

verses.kjv: And if a man shall take his brother’s wife, it is an unclean thing: he hath uncovered his brother’s nakedness; they shall be childless.
verses.ct: If a man marries his brother's wife, it is an act of impurity. He has violated his brother's marriage — they will be childless.

verses.kjv: Ye shall therefore keep all my statutes, and all my judgments, and do them: that the land, whither I bring you to dwell therein, spue you not out.
verses.ct: So obey all my regulations and all my laws, and carry them out. Otherwise the land where I am bringing you to live will vomit you out.

verses.kjv: And ye shall not walk in the manners of the nation, which I cast out before you: for they committed all these things, and therefore I abhorred them.
verses.ct: Do not follow the customs of the nations that I am driving out ahead of you. They practiced all these things, and that is why I was disgusted by them.

verses.kjv: But I have said unto you, Ye shall inherit their land, and I will give it unto you to possess it, a land that floweth with milk and honey: I am the LORD your God, which have separated you from other people.
verses.ct: But I have told you: You will take possession of their land. I will give it to you as your own — a land flowing with milk and honey. I am the LORD your God, who has set you apart from all other peoples.

verses.kjv: Ye shall therefore put difference between clean beasts and unclean, and between unclean fowls and clean: and ye shall not make your souls abominable by beast, or by fowl, or by any manner of living thing that creepeth on the ground, which I have separated from you as unclean.
verses.ct: So you must distinguish between clean and unclean animals, and between unclean and clean birds. Do not make yourselves detestable through any animal, bird, or creature that moves along the ground — those that I have designated as unclean for you.

verses.kjv: And ye shall be holy unto me: for I the LORD am holy, and have severed you from other people, that ye should be mine.
verses.ct: You must be holy to me, because I the LORD am holy, and I have set you apart from all other peoples to belong to me.

verses.kjv: A man also or woman that hath a familiar spirit, or that is a wizard, shall surely be put to death: they shall stone them with stones: their blood shall be upon them.
verses.ct: Any man or woman who is a medium or a spiritist must be executed. The people must stone them to death — they are responsible for their own deaths."
